user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Breaks Easy - DO NOT TRAVEL W/
review_content:
I was excited when I bought this product because I had wanted it for a long time. When I first started using the product I felt like I wasn’t getting that much pay off but I figured maybe you just have to get into it some more and then it will apply better. It’s mostly just glitter not really a “glow”. But the worst thing I experience was when I traveled with it. I packed in into my makeup bag in my checked bag and when I got to my destination it was destroyed all the bars and highlight had moved around in the package. So I gently moved them back only the bottom bar was crushed. So the next time I had to board the plane I carried it in my purse hoping if I was careful it would not get mixed up again. But of course when I got to our hotel and checked it was all mixed up and crushed looking. So to fix this issue I moved the pieces back in place and folded a couple tissues and set them on top of the makeup and then stored in my purse for the next plane ride. Once I got home I checked and everything was still in place! I do not recommend traveling with this product because it breaks so easy unless you fill it with tissue. Other then that the product is okay but not the amazing glow I was hoping to get for the $50 I spent on it.
…read more

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Type Oily', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Green']
review_content:
I LOVE this shimmer brick more than I could possibly explain! Honestly, I first bought it after Prince William and Catherine's wedding when I found out that she wore it on her big day. I loved how her makeup looked and immediately ordered the shade she wore -- Pink Quartz. I was not disappointed when I tried it for myself. I have this in two colours -- Pink Quartz and Beige(from BB Online). To use, I sweep my blush brush over the entire brick, getting a little of each colour, and then dust it over my face. The result is an air brushed finish. My pores and fine lines are blurred away and I am left with a healthy glow. This is not a glittery "going to the club" shimmer at all, but an illuminated "lit from within" finish. In the past I have used Josie Maran's Argan Enlightenment Illuminizing Veil and Laura Mercier Matt Radiance Baked Powder. I like this so much better! This gives a warmth to the skin that other highlighting powders don't. I have one of these makeup bricks with me at all times for touch-ups. They are awesome and foolproof!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Skin Type Normal', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Hazel']
review_content: I purchased this in the rosy pink and I wanted to love it, but I just can't. The shimmer is pretty but i can barely get any product on the brush and when I did, it barely showed on my face.

I like the look that contouring gives me but I hate applying it and the heavy look it can give. This makes it so simple. I just swipe my brush in the same direction across a few times then swipe it across my cheeks a few times with the light side up and dark side down and it looks really nice. It gives a pretty glow and it lasts a long time. I also can use this as eyeshadow.

user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: I've been using BB Brick for several years in the bronze and I love the suble tiint it gives to my cheeks and face. I wanted a change so I tried the rosy pink. I think the tint is too light for my skin tone so I'm using it over a blush. Too much work.....so it's not my go-to cheek color. My advise....pick a color that works and stay with it.
Gives you PERFECT look for any occasion. You wake up put the shimmer on and you look like a deevah waking up!! Even on facetime people say that my skin looks beautiful when I wear bobbi!!! BUY NOW!

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: I bought this because I love Bobbi Brown and I thought this was a decent price for the size.The colors are flattering and you can easily build the color intensity. I like the bronzy shades and the blush shades, but I am disappointed by the highlight itself. It's a little too sparkly/glittery for my skin texture.

user_specs: ['Age 13-17', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: I really enjoyed using this product. The darker bronze colors serve very well as a contouring bronzer and the lighter pink and white colors give you a poppin highlight.

What can I say. This is and always will be one of my ride or die products, you can use it for highlight, bronzer, eye shadow, really anything if you have the imagination. The pigmentation is great, it lasts, and it's not even that expensive!

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Skin Type Normal', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Eye Color Brown']
review_content: Its a shimmer that is worth every penny! Never loved one so much and its so soft you can use it day or night! Find your shade and buy one!

With so many other highlighters out there on the market I would suggest trying something else. This one I could barely get any product on the brush and then when I did finally apply it on my face it made me look ashy? I'm pretty fake skinned so I didn't get that at all. Ended up giving it to a friend. Love Bobbi Brown products but this one was a pass for me.
